resources.string:
- Added the ability to sign out 
 - Added the ability to log out from all devices except the current one 
 - Now to delete a group you need to enter a confirmation code 
 - The display of the teacher\â€™s name in the schedule was fixed (if the name was not completely filled, then in some places the text "null" was displayed) 
 - Also, the display of the teacher's full name in the teacher's selection list in the schedule editing window has been fixed
